summary: ONE DAY DRIVING HOME I NOTICED THAT THE CRUISE CONTROL LIGHT AND THE PARKING BRAKE LIGHTS WERE FLASHING. ALONG WITH THE STABILITY CONTROL AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHTS BEING ON STEADY. THE LIGHTS STAY ON WHILE DRIVING ON ANY ROAD OR STATIONARY. UNHOOKING BATTERY TERMINALS CLEARS THE LIGHTS FROM ANYWHERE BETWEEN A COUPLE HOURS TO SEVERAL WEEKS. I HAVE DONE RESEARCH AND SEEN THAT THIS IS A COMMON ISSUE WITH THESE VEHICLES AND NOTHING THAT IS DONE FIXES IT.
